int ExportDialog::GetCoordinateSystem (  )  const

Return selected coordinate system id.

If global coordinate system is selected, returns 0. To local coordinate system returns 1.

Referenced by MainWindow::on_actionExport_PhotonMap_triggered().

QString ExportDialog::GetExportFileName (  )  const

Returns id to indicate selected photon map photons.

If all photon map is selected, returns 0. To surface photon map returns 1.

See also:
GetSelectedSurface

Referenced by MainWindow::on_actionExport_PhotonMap_triggered().

SoNodeKitPath * ExportDialog::GetSelectedSurface (  )  const

Return selected surface node instance.

Returns NULL if there is not selection or selected node is not surface node.
